long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Typify is a browser extension created for designers, developers, and the curiously minded!

It helps you analyse the fonts used on any page by examining each text node and displaying a full list of the unique text styles for that page.

Typify displays the following css properties for each unique font style it finds:
- Font family
- Font size
- Font weight
- Colour
